site.description: Enhanced Class Decompiler project update site.

category-def.name: Enhanced Class Decompiler (Core)
category-def.label: Enhanced Class Decompiler (Core)
category-def.description: Enhanced Class Decompiler integrates JD, Jad, FernFlower, Quiltflower, CFR, Procyon with Eclipse seamlessly. It allows Java developers to debug class files without source code directly.

category-def.name: Enhanced Class Decompiler (Optional)

category-def.description: Enhanced Class Decompiler integrates JD, Jad, FernFlower, Quiltflower, CFR, Procyon with Eclipse seamlessly. It allows Java developers to debug class files without source code directly.
